title: Is it just me or does bard already seem OP?
body: I can't wait to see him break the game lol.

replies.body:
his ult get a 10 man ult GG lol or ult your adc while your team dies or ult theirs and kill their team
he will be the biggest troll champ of all time
yeah I mean riot never makes troll champs before *cough* teemo *cough cough* jax *coughs up blood* master yi *cough*
Yeah... The troll aspect of this guy, not sure if Riot thought this through properly xD
